content: Name objects around the house that use electricity.

Certainly! Here are some common household objects that use electricity:

1. Refrigerator
2. Microwave oven
3. Dishwasher
4. Washing machine
5. Dryer
6. Electric stove
7. Toaster
8. Coffee maker
9. Television
10. Computer
11. Laptop
12. Smartphone charger
13. Air conditioner
14. Heater
15. Ceiling fan
16. Table lamp
17. Vacuum cleaner
18. Hairdryer
19. Electric toothbrush
20. Water heater

These are just a few examples, and there are many more devices and appliances that rely on electricity to function in a typical household.
